H0.text: what color jerseys do the redskins wear at home. Burgundy

H1.text: what color jerseys do the redskins wear at home. White

H2.text: what color jerseys do the redskins wear at home. Navy Blue

H3.text: what color jerseys do the redskins wear at home. Gold

A4.text: From 1981 through 2000, Washington wore their white jerseys over burgundy pants at home almost exclusively.

A5.text: The standard uniform combination from then on was burgundy-on-gold at home and white-on-burgundy on the road with burgundy socks.

A6.text: In 2001, the team wore burgundy for all home games in the preseason and regular season per a decision by Marty Schottenheimer, their coach for that year.

A7.text: In 2006, the white jersey over burgundy pants look reappeared in a home game against the Carolina Panthers.
